subject: Be ahead of other Dental Clinics with new technologies
title: Old software, paper or something else?
descr: Whether your practice uses old software or simply paper, Dental Tap has been designed and created for you!
ben.title: Benefits:
ben.descr1: We will help you digitize paper records or move all the data from your old software.
ben.descr2: Save your time and money on setting up all your technical stuff, we will take care of everything.
ben.descr3: Our software is safe to use. We guarantee 99.5% of uptime and have a daily data backups, complied with your local laws.
title2: Free support, free trial, free trainig
